title: BONITARA Luxury eCommerce Platform – Full Rebuild

requirements.text: Build a Home page with a full-width hero section, featured categories section (Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, Fragrance), best sellers product grid, about/brand story section, customer reviews carousel, and newsletter signup section.

quotes: Full luxury eCommerce site for BONITARA brand

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays brand name BONITARA and tagline 'Inspired By Elegance'
Four featured category cards link to their respective category pages
Best sellers grid shows at least 8 products with image, name, and price
Newsletter signup form captures email and shows success confirmation

requirements.text: Create 4 product category pages — Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, and Fragrance — each displaying 25+ products with filtering and sorting options.

quotes: 4 categories (Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, Fragrance), 100+ products

acceptanceCriteria: Each category page lists at least 25 products
Products can be filtered by price range and sorted by price/popularity/newest
Product cards show image, name, price, and Add to Cart / Wishlist buttons

requirements.text: Build individual product detail pages showing full product info: name, description, price, SKU, stock status, image gallery, related products, and Add to Cart / Wishlist controls.

quotes: full product details, pricing, SKU, stock, wishlist, related products

acceptanceCriteria: Product detail page displays image gallery, description, SKU, price, and stock status
Related products section shows at least 4 items from the same category
Add to Cart and Add to Wishlist buttons are functional

requirements.text: Implement a shopping cart with item management (add, remove, update quantity), subtotal calculation, and proceed to checkout flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Cart persists items across page navigation
Quantities can be increased, decreased, or removed
Subtotal updates in real time
Checkout button navigates to checkout page

requirements.text: Build a checkout page with shipping address form, order summary, and payment method selection supporting Razorpay, Stripe, and UPI placeholder options.

quotes: Payment integration: Razorpay, Stripe, UPI placeholder

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout form collects name, address, city, state, pincode, phone, and email
Order summary shows items, quantities, subtotal, shipping, and total
Payment method selector displays Razorpay, Stripe, and UPI as options
UPI option shows a placeholder message indicating coming soon

requirements.text: Implement user account system with registration, login, profile management, order history, and order tracking.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register and log in
Profile page shows saved address and account details
Order history lists past orders with status
Order tracking page allows users to view current order status

requirements.text: Build a Wholesale page with bulk pricing tiers, MOQ (minimum order quantity) information, private label details, GST information, and an email-enabled inquiry form.

quotes: Wholesale page with bulk pricing, MOQ, private label, GST info, and email-enabled inquiry form

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays tiered pricing table based on order quantity
MOQ, private label program, and GST details are clearly listed
Inquiry form collects business name, contact, email, product interest, and quantity
Form submission stores the inquiry in the backend

requirements.text: Create static informational pages: FAQ, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions, Return & Refund Policy, and Contact Us with a functional contact form.

quotes: FAQ, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions, Return & Refund Policy, and Contact Us pages

acceptanceCriteria: Each page renders with appropriate content sections
FAQ uses an accordion/expandable format
Contact Us form collects name, email, subject, and message and stores submissions in the backend

requirements.text: Build an Admin Dashboard allowing management of products (add/edit/delete), inventory levels, order management with status updates, and viewing wholesale and contact inquiries.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can add, edit, and delete products across all categories
Inventory levels can be updated per product
Orders can be viewed and their status updated (Processing, Shipped, Delivered)
Wholesale and contact form inquiries are listed and viewable

requirements.text: Build a Blog section with a listing page and individual blog post detail pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Blog listing page shows post title, excerpt, date, and thumbnail
Individual post page renders full content
Admin can create and manage blog posts

requirements.text: Apply a luxury visual theme across all pages using an ivory/beige/soft gold/charcoal color palette, elegant serif typography for headings, smooth animations, hover effects on interactive elements, and fully mobile-responsive layouts.

quotes: Luxury UI: ivory/beige/soft gold/charcoal palette, smooth animations, hover effects, elegant typography, SEO optimized, mobile responsive

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette consistently uses ivory (#FFFFF0), beige (#F5F0E8), soft gold (#C9A84C), and charcoal (#2C2C2C)
Headings use an elegant serif font; body text uses a clean sans-serif
Product cards and buttons have smooth hover transitions
All pages are fully usable on mobile and tablet screen sizes

requirements.text: Generate and render a luxury brand hero background image and a BONITARA logo as static assets used throughout the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the generated luxury background image
Logo appears in the navigation header and footer
Images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated

constraints: All backend logic must remain in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Do not use external payment SDKs for real transactions — Razorpay and Stripe integrations should be UI placeholder flows; UPI must be marked as coming soon
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Generated images must be served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated — do not route them through the backend
nonGoals: External database or cloud storage integration
Actual live payment processing (Razorpay/Stripe SDK live mode)

required: Luxury eCommerce hero banner with soft bokeh floral background in ivory and gold tones, elegant and minimal (hero-banner.dim_1920x900.png)
BONITARA brand wordmark logo in gold lettering on transparent background, serif font, refined and minimal (bonitara-logo.dim_400x120.png)
Soap Making category card background — artisan soap bars arranged elegantly on marble surface in warm tones (category-soap.dim_600x400.png)
Candle Making category card background — lit candles with soft glow on beige linen surface (category-candle.dim_600x400.png)
Resin Art category card background — colorful resin art pieces with gold accents on neutral background (category-resin.dim_600x400.png)
Fragrance category card background — perfume bottles and dried botanicals on ivory background (category-fragrance.dim_600x400.png)
